snark: Wow, that print looks like it came out of a toaster. Nice work.

it_crowd: Have you tried turning it off and on again?
People. What a bunch of bastards.
I came here to drink milk and kick ass... and I’ve just finished my milk.
I like being weird. Weird’s all I’ve got.
I’m sorry, are you from the past?
The computer isn't broken, you are.
I’ve been called a lot of things, but never wrong.
I wish I could say you were cleverer.
I already told you once.
That's your job, isn’t it?
Error: user not found.
I’m not a person, I’m a machine with feelings.
I am the IT department. I solve problems YOU cause.
This is worse than juggling hedgehogs.
I don't do windows.
You’ve got no idea how hard I try.
I'm trying to make this look like we do work.
Computers make very fast, very accurate mistakes.
I’m surrounded by idiots!
I used to be someone, then I worked in IT.
Yes, I can hear you. No, I’m not listening.
Did you try turning reality down?
You broke it, so obviously it hates you.
I'm the hero the network deserves.
That’s not a bug, that’s a feature.
Some days I amaze myself. Other days I put the trash in the fridge.
I would explain it to you, but your brain might explode.
You’re about as useful as a chocolate teapot.
